remarks: One-to-one property of a lattice translation.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrn1o.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltrn1o.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrn1o.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrn11 $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( ( F ` X ) = ( F ` Y ) <-> X = Y ) ) $.
